      • searchByOptions

        @GetMapping
public org.springframework.hateoas.CollectionModel<Certificate> searchByOptions(com.epam.esm.service.dto.Filter filter,
                                                                                            @RequestParam(name="sort",required=false)
                                                                                            java.util.Set<java.lang.String> sorts,
                                                                                            com.epam.esm.service.dto.PageDto page)
        Search certificates by filter params.
        Parameters:
        tags - the certificate names
        names - the certificate names
        descriptions - the certificate descriptions
        mode - the search mode (1 - full match/0 - part of request)
        sort - the sort type (NAME,DATE/ASC,DESC | Ex. NAME_ASC, DATE_DESC)
        Returns:
        the certificate objects

public org.springframework.hateoas.RepresentationModel<Certificate> addCertificate(com.epam.esm.service.dto.CertificateDto certificate)
